verb

noun

noun
  1. (Kamrupi) boy
  2. (Kamrupi) son
  3. (informal) A young male home servant.
  4. father, mother (used by the Ahom community)

noun

noun

name

adj

noun

noun

noun

  3. reed

character
  1. The fourth character in the Assamese and Bengali alphabet. It's called "Dirgho i" or "Digho i".

character
  1. The fifth character in the Assamese alphabet. It's called "Hrosso u" or "Hoso u".

column2:
noun
  1. a loud whistle, the act of whistling loudly
  2. a loud whistle, the sound of whistling loudly

adj
  1. dry, arid, dehydrated
  2. cruel, merciless, ruthless, harsh, rude, unkind
  3. mundane

column2:
verb
  1. to cause to mount
  2. to elevate, lift up
  3. to awake
  4. to raise
  5. to remove
  6. (computing) to upload

adj
  1. excitable, rush, unsteady, hyperactive, hyper, fickle-minded

noun
  1. Assam mole shrew (Anourosorex assamensis)
  2. white-tailed mole (Parascaptor leucura)
  3. mole (Talpidae)

verb
  1. to say [+ (object) -ক = to]

adj
  1. strong, acute, keen, intense, nip
  2. strict, harsh, stringent, stern

verb
  1. to snatch away, take by force
  2. to draw
  3. to take out from a cooking pot

noun
  1. Kati the 7th month in the Assamese lunar calendar

verb
  1. to cause to lean in horizontal position on something.
  2. (transitive) to slant

verb
  1. to lean in horizontal position on something.
  2. (intransitive) to slant

column2:
noun
  1. bite
  2. annoying (who annoys with repeated demands.)

verb

column2:
noun
  1. coconut shell
  2. a scoop or ladle made of a coconut shell
  3. a hole or depression in the earth

noun
  1. a wooden rake or implement like a hoe with a handle used in gathering on the thrashing floor.

character

verb
  1. pound, pulverized
  2. hit with the blunt head of a heavy tool to tighten.
  3. crush the testicles of a bull

column2:
adj
  1. Goria
  2. lazy, slothful

noun
  1. Goria, a predominantly Muslim community of Assam whose ancestors came from Gauda.
  2. lazy

character
  1. The fifteenth character in the Assamese alphabet.

column2:
adj
  1. main, prime
  2. leader, headman

noun
  1. winning post in some games
  2. main or central stripe or twig of a basket
  3. an uncastrated male animal kept copulating
  4. a floral design used for weaving
  5. an earthen pot used for converting milk into curd
  6. decoy bird
  7. bird net

character
  1. the sixteenth character in the Assamese abugida

character
  1. The seventeenth character in the Assamese alphabet. It is called "Prôthôm Sô"

column2:
noun
  1. female silk moth
  2. (dialectal) butterfly
  3. circle, spiral
  4. pinwheel, windmill toy
  5. (anatomy) kneecap

adv
  1. two days before yesterday
  2. two days after tomorrow

column2:
verb
  1. (transitive) to drive (a vehicle)
  2. (transitive) to play (a device to watch or listen)
  3. (transitive) to retain, maintain, continue

column2:
noun
  1. Sot the 12th month in the Assamese lunar calendar

adv
  1. two days before yesterday
  2. two days after tomorrow

character
  1. The eighteenth character in the Assamese alphabet. It is called "Ditiyô Sô"

column2:
verb
  1. to peel, to remove skin (usually of a vertebrate)

column2:
adj
  1. pulled, tugged
  2. dragged
  3. stretched
  4. tightly drawn

verb
  1. to pull, tug
  2. to drag
  3. to stretch
  4. to draw tight

noun
  1. a one-horse open carriage with a pair of wheels
  2. (transferred sense, neologism) an electric rickshaw

column2:
character
  1. The 24th character in the Assamese alphabet. It is called "Murdhônyô dô"

noun
  1. coach (of a train)
  2. doba, a kind of drum, kettledrum

column2:
noun
  1. post
  2. shout, loud call (of rooster, house gecko etc.)
  3. cockcrow
  4. bid (in auction or in card game)

verb
  1. to bid, speak one's stand (in auction or in card game)
  2. to sting, nettle, bite (by snake, stinging caterpillar, bee etc.)

column2:
noun
  1. grandee. A respectful term of address to a man of higher rank or position.

column2:
character
  1. The 26th character in the Assamese alphabet. It is called "Murdhôinnô nô"

character
  1. The 27th character in the Assamese alphabet. It is called "Dontia to" or "Donto to".

pron
  1. you (singular; very familiar, inferior)
  2. (dialectal) you (singular; non honorific)

conj
  1. (formal, literary) even then, still, in spite of that

adj
  1. a lot, plethora
  2. (slang) Used in a sense when someone does something very efficiently.

noun
  1. list
  2. catalogue
  3. table (visual representation of data on a grid)

column2:
noun
  1. The act of seizing suddenly by the hand; A snatch of the hand

column2:
verb
  1. (intransitive) to stand, be upright
  2. (intransitive) to erect

noun
  1. deep

character
  1. The 29th character in the Assamese alphabet. It is called দন্তীয়া দ (dontia do) or দন্ত দ (donto do)

column2:
verb
  1. to give, grant, award
  2. to orate, deliver
  3. to pay
  4. (following an oblique infinitive verb) to allow, let
  5. auxiliary verb: to finally do; finish doing

column2:
adj
  1. caught

verb
  1. cause to catch
  2. cause to begin, start [-লৈ ধৰা (-loi dhora)]
  3. cause to suppose, imagine
  4. cause to nitpick
  5. cause to use

noun
  1. a set of spiritual beliefs that governs one's life
  2. property, faculty of a thing
  3. righteousness
  4. faith in god
  5. a ceremony performed with the hope of attaining felicity after death
  6. a name of Yama

character
  1. The 31st character in the Assamese alphabet. It is called "Dontia no" or "Donto no".

num
  1. nine

adj
  1. new

column2:
verb
  1. to take down, bring down
  2. to unload

noun
  1. paik, adult and able males in Ahom kingdom who were obligated to render service to the state and form its militia in return for a piece of land for cultivation owned by the kingdom.

noun
  1. twist, turn
  2. whirlpool
  3. interlacement, twist
  4. the act of cooking
  5. digestion
  6. mistake, flaw
  7. An offence made to a bhokot.

noun

  2. the degree of heat required for tempering of cutting instruments or hardening of earthen vessels.
  3. turban

column2:
adj
  1. can
  2. spread
  3. plucked

verb
  1. to can, be able to
  2. to spread out
  3. to pluck, bring down

noun
  1. mercury, Hg

noun
  1. (Kamrupi, South Kamrup dist.) pigeon, domestic pigeon

noun
  1. juice from paan (a snack made from betel leaf) that is often spat out

verb

noun
  1. baby fish, young fish, fry, fingerling

verb

verb
  1. (become) to increase (in amount or intensity)
  2. to grow, become larger (in size)
  3. to serve, distribute, share
  4. (become) to rise (e.g. price, temperature)
  5. (become) to boost
  6. (with আগ (ag)) to move ahead, continue

column2:
verb
  1. to prick, pierce
  2. to inflict a painful wound by injecting poison with the sting.

column2:
adj
  1. broken
  2. escaped

verb
  1. to break
  2. to fracture
  3. to damage
  4. to destroy, demolish
  5. to spoil
  6. to cancel

column2:
noun
  1. dam

verb
  1. to block one's way; obstruct the way of; stop advancement
  2. to put a fence
  3. to make a dam on the way of flowing water
  4. to make a present of; give present

noun
  1. foundation, raised bed of earth, plinth
  2. base
  3. a lump of earth taken up round the roof of a plant when transplanting

noun
  1. masala, spice

  3. The loose mixture of gravel, sand, cement and water which is used as building material.
  4. punishment

adj
  1. tasty (also check etymology 3)
  2. rubbed
  3. soft

noun
  1. joy, pleasure, delight, happiness

verb
  1. to rub
  2. to brush
  3. to soften, become soft
  4. to immerse

column2:
verb
  1. to go, depart
  2. to go to, extend
  3. an auxiliary verb
  4. marks the passive voice
  5. (with intransitive verbs) indicates motion away from
  6. (with dative subject verbs) indicates a definitive change
  7. (with transitive verbs) indicates completion or haste

column2:
verb
  1. to feel [-ৰ লাগ- (-r lag-)]
  2. to need, require [-ক লাগ- (-k lag-)]
  3. (informal) to want
  4. to be hit, shoved
  5. to be stuck
  6. an auxiliary verb expressing beginning: to begin to, start
  7. to belong

column2:
verb
  1. to move, be shaken

column2:
noun
  1. corpse, dead body, carcass

character
  1. The 41st character in the Assamese alphabet. It is called "Taloibbo Xo"

num
  1. hundred

noun
  1. Haun the 4th month in the Assamese lunar calendar

noun
  1. machine, equipment, apparatus
  2. factory
  3. bullseye snakehead (Channa marulius)
  4. cobra snakehead (Channa aurantimaculata)
  5. Shorea assamica (makai)
  6. hypocrisy, dissimulation
  7. wedge, spike

verb
  1. to dry
  2. to heal (from injury)
  3. to become parched, dehydrated

column2:
character
  1. The 42nd character in the Assamese alphabet. It is called "Murdhôinnô Xô"

character
  1. The 43rd character in the Assamese alphabet. It is called দন্তীয়া স (dontia xo) or দন্ত স (donto xo) which means "dental স", though its actual pronunciation is different.

adj
  1. true
  2. reserved, stored, saved, garnered
  3. accumulated, collected, amassed, stockpiled
  4. accumulate, collect, amass, stockpile

noun

column2:
noun
  1. dress, costume
  2. form, shape
  3. vessel, utensil
  4. food offered to God
  5. implements
  6. a kind of rice beer

verb
  1. to dress, decorate
  2. to build, construct, make, create, prepare
  3. to invent, build, make

adj
  1. built, constructed, made, prepared

column2:
noun
  1. string (made of split cane or rattan)
  2. tendril
  3. A small, narrow piece of skin by the edge of a nail detached from the underlying flesh.

column2:
character
  1. The 44th character in the Assamese alphabet.

verb
  1. to be
  2. to become
  3. to occur, happen
  4. to result, have an effect
  5. to be born
  6. to pass by, elapse
  7. (with instrumental-case subject) to be done, committed
  8. enough
  9. a conjunct verb turning any noun or adjective into a verb

column2:
noun
  1. (historical) an officer appointed as head of a thousand soldiers during Ahom rule in Assam

noun
  1. a line or row of houses attached to a religious establishment or school for the residence of the disciples or pupils.

column2:
verb
  1. to be
  2. to become
  3. to occur, happen
  4. to result, have an effect
  5. to be born
  6. to pass by, elapse
  7. (with instrumental-case subject) to be done, committed
  8. enough
  9. a conjunct verb turning any noun or adjective into a verb
